com.linecorp.armeria.common

Interface Request

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HttpRequest, RpcRequest
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultHttpRequest, DefaultRpcRequest

    public interface Request
    A request. It has to be a HttpRequest or a RpcRequest.
